lines.gurmukhi: crn kml rj mjn pRqwp Aiq purb qIrQ koit crn srin hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Raj Majan Prataap Ati , Purab Teerad Koti Charan Sarani Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Bathing in the holy dust of the lotus feet of the True Guru has great significance. Millions of places of pilgrimage reside in the refuge of the True Guru. One is deemed to have visited all the holy places by the touch of the dust of His holy feet.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml rj mjn pRqwp Aiq dyvI dyv syvk huie pUjq crn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Raj Majan Prataap Ati , Dayvee Dayv Sayvak Hui Poojat Charan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The glory and grandeur of the dust of True Guru's holy feet supreme. All gods and goddesses worship Him as His humble servants. (worship of all gods and goddesses lie in feet of the True Guru).

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml rj mjn pRqwp Aiq kwrn ADIn huqy kIn kwrn krn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Raj Majan Prataap Ati , Kaaran Adheen Houtay Keen Kaaran Karan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The significance of bathing in the dust of the holy feet of True Guru is so greatÂ· that he who is ever under the causes, himself becomes the creator of those causes, by becoming a devoted slave of the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml rj mjn pRqwp Aiq piqq punIq Bey qwrn qrn hY ]339]
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Raj Majan Prataap Ati , Patit Pouneet Bhaay Taaran Taran Hai ?339?

Shabad OS B.translation: Importance of touching of True Guru's holy feet is so supreme that a human being badly soiled in sins of maya becomes pious in his refuge. He even becomes a ship for others to sail across the worldly ocean. (339)
